items.sentence: When I was young, I used to climb trees a lot.
I don\'t want to park too close to Tom\'s car.
I\'ve already told Tom that he has to do that.
I\'ve always fed my dogs in the early evening.
I\'ve always wanted to learn to play the oboe.
Tom loves Mary, but the feeling is not mutual.
I would never feed my dog commercial dog food.
I bet you can\'t guess where I was last night!
Tom grew up in a small town not far from here.
Tom had already eaten lunch when Mary arrived.
